forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun sinks gently behind the iconic skyline of San Francisco, the evening presents a tableau of clarity and serenity. The skies are mostly clear, a canvas of deepening blues stretching toward the horizon. Tonight, temperatures will settle around a comfortable 56 degrees, accompanied by a light west-southwest breeze that whispers through the streets, dancing at 6 to 13 mph and teasing occasional gusts close to 21 mph. A pleasant evening awaits, with the city aglow in the last vestiges of twilight.

Transitioning into tomorrow, expect a sunlit day marked by mostly sunny skies, where highs near 66 will cool slightly to around 64 as the afternoon unfolds. The winds shall continue their playful ballet, shifting to 6 to 15 mph. With no fog shrouding the golden towers and bridges, it's an opportune moment to venture out—perhaps a leisurely walk along the waterfront or a quiet moment in one of the city’s many parks. For those planning to embrace the outdoor charm, consider layers; a light sweater paired with comfortable shoes would be wise to prepare for the occasional chill that can weave through the afternoon. San Francisco’s beauty beckons; let the city’s vibrant rhythm guide your exploration under clear, open skies.
